name: SULFOROKAnol L270/1 (Sodium Laureth Sulfate)
description: SULFOROKAnol L270/1 (Sodium Laureth Sulfate) is an anionic surfactant from the group of alkyl ether sulfates (INCI name: Sodium Laureth Sulfate). It is based mainly on raw material of natural origin. The product is available as a liquid paste, colorless to light yellow, and has a concentrated form - a 70% aqueous solution, which reduces transport and storage costs. The product does not contain any preservatives. SULFOROKAnol L270/1 shows complete solubility even in hard water.

Synonyms: Poly(oxy-1,2-ethanediyl), α-sulfo-ω-hydroxy-, C12-14-alkyl ethers, sodium salts
